attributes.action: promote, urgently and actively, the commissioning of new hydro-electric pumped storage schemes in regions of the United Kingdom where major wind generated capacity is, or is being, installed. and where the topography is suitable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At a recent meeting about global climate change, and the possible causes thereof, of the South Wales Association of the Institution of Civil Engineers (SWA ICE) Retired Engineers Group (REG) it was resolved to petition the PM on the following:
nuclear power generation, pumped storage schemes, tidal power schemes and energy saving measures.
This is the second petition. It was supported by 100% of those present.
